mapper.insert: insert into t_home (id, storeynum, unitnum, housenum, type, area, address, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{storeynum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{housenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_home set storeynum = #{storeynum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unitnum = #{unitnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, housenum = #{housenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, storeynum, unitnum, housenum, type, area, address, remark from t_home
